DOC.brief_summary: This is a Post-Marketing Surveillance study in India to evaluate safety and efficacy of BOTOX® (Botulinum Toxin Type A) in the treatment of patients with urinary incontinence due to neurogenic detrusor overactivity or overactive bladder.
DOC.brief_title: A Safety and Efficacy Study of BOTOX® (Botulinum Toxin Type A) in Patients With Urinary Incontinence Due to Neurogenic Detrusor Overactivity or Overactive Bladder in India
DOC.criteria: Patients with urinary incontinence due to NDO or OAB treated with BOTOX® as per local standard of care in clinical practice.
